GSD.description:
USB: gadget: Fix use-after-free Read in usb_udc_uevent()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.7 by commit f44b0b95d50fffeca036e1ba36770390e0b519dd. For more details please see the references link.
